mapper.select: SELECT MNO FROM MEMBER WHERE MNICK=#{mnick}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TIMELINE VALUES (SEQ_TID.NEXTVAL, #{mNo}, DEFAULT, #{tContent}, DEFAULT, #{hashTag})
mapper.select: SELECT TID, PROFILE_PATH, MNICK, TDATE, TCONTENT, HASHTAG FROM ( SELECT T.TID, M.PROFILE_PATH, M.MNICK, T.TDATE, T.TCONTENT, T.HASHTAG, B.BLOCK FROM MEMBER M JOIN TIMELINE T ON(M.MNO=T.MNO) LEFT JOIN BLOCK_TIMELINE B ON(T.MNO=B.MNO AND T.TID=B.TID) WHERE BLOCK IS NULL ORDER BY T.TID DESC) WHERE ROWNUM<=20 ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT TID, PROFILE_PATH, MNICK, TDATE, TCONTENT, HASHTAG FROM ( SELECT T.TID, M.PROFILE_PATH, M.MNICK, T.TDATE, T.TCONTENT, T.HASHTAG, B.BLOCK FROM MEMBER M JOIN TIMELINE T ON(M.MNO=T.MNO) LEFT JOIN BLOCK_TIMELINE B ON(T.MNO=B.MNO AND T.TID=B.TID) WHERE T.TID< #{tId} AND BLOCK IS NULL ORDER BY 1 DESC) WHERE ROWNUM<=10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BLOCK_TIMELINE VALUES((SELECT MNO FROM MEMBER WHERE MNICK=#{mNick}), #{tId}, 'Y')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT T.TID, M.PROFILE_PATH, M.MNICK, T.TDATE, T.TCONTENT, T.HASHTAG FROM MEMBER M JOIN TIMELINE T ON(M.MNO=T.MNO) ORDER BY T.TID DESC) WHERE ROWNUM<=10
SELECT T.TID, M.PROFILE_PATH, M.MNICK, T.TDATE, T.TCONTENT, T.HASHTAG FROM MEMBER M JOIN TIMELINE T ON(M.MNO=T.MNO) WHERE T.HASHTAG LIKE '%'||#{text}||'%'
